name: chezmoi (dotfiles manager)
description: Installs chezmoi and optionally initializes dotfiles for the target user from a git repository.

repoUrl.description: Git URL for dotfiles (e.g., https://github.com/user/dots or git@github.com:user/dots.git). Empty = do not init.

apply.description: Run `chezmoi init --apply` if repoUrl is set.

useLoginShell.description: Execute init/apply in a login shell for the target user (safer PATH/XDG).
